# titleCell

**Instance Property**

The cell used to display the receiver’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var titleCell: Any { get }
```

## Configuring Boxes

- **borderRect**: The rectangle in which the receiver’s border is drawn.
- **boxType**: The receiver’s box type.
- **borderType**: The receiver’s border type.
- **isTransparent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is transparent.
- **title**: The receiver’s title.
- **titleFont**: The font object used to draw the receiver’s title.
- **titlePosition**: A constant representing the title position.
- **titleRect**: The rectangle in which the receiver’s title is drawn.
